title: Developer and Product Manager (2018)
label: JS, SASS
description: Designed and developed the Basketball Scorekeeping web app with JavaScript and HTML/SASS. This app is intended to replace a tedious paper-and-pencil process used to score youth basketball games.

title: Developer and Product Manager (2018)
label: JS, SASS
description: Designed and developed the Lucky Cat - Game web app with JavaScript, SASS, and HTML. Click Lucky Cat to grow your pot of gold.

title: Developer and Product Manager (2017, 2013)
label: JS, CSS
description:
• Ported the Practical Retirement Calculator to JavaScript and HTML/CSS
  • Designed an easy-to-use retirement calculator app for Android mobile devices. Developed the prototype and algorithm using Excel.

title: Developer (2017)
label: JS, SASS
description: Developed Caption Generator feature in JavaScript to show random captions and incorporate new captions input by user.

title: Project Manager for HappyFunCorp’s Client Twitter (2016-17)
label: PM
alt: Image of Twitter app on a TV
description:
Lead engineering team through development for on-schedule and on-budget launch and follow up releases for TV apps:
  • Twitter for Apple TV
  • Twitter on Fire TV
  • Twitter for Android TV
  • Twitter for Roku

    • Apple named Twitter for Apple TV App of the Year for 2016.

title: Product Manager and Project Manager for HappyFunCorp’s client InnovateEDU (2015-16)
label: PM
alt: Screenshot of Cortex Learning Management System
description:

  • Collaborate with client team to develop and prioritize updates.

title: Project Manger for HappyFunCorp's Client Audible (2015-16)
label: PM
description: Lead engineering team through development of on-schedule and on-budget release of responsive, online marketing blog, Audible Range.

title: Product Manager and Project Manager for HappyFunCorp’s Client ParkSuite (2015)
label: PM
description:

title: Product Manager for HappyFunCorp’s Client Kaizenvest (2015)
label: PM
description:

title: Product Manager and Project Manager for HappyFunCorp's Client RW-3 (2014-15)

description:

title: Product Manager and Project Manager for New York Eye and Ear Infirmary of Mount Sinai (2013-14)
label: PM
description:
